snippet: Wheaton College scrubbed J. Dennis Hastert’s name from its public policy center after the former House speaker’s indictment on charges that he lied to the F.B.I. about financial transactions.
abstract: Former Republican House Speaker J Dennis Hastert's name is removed from public policy center of his alma mater Wheaton College after his indictment for lying to FBI about bank withdrawals and past sexual misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Wheaton College scrubbed J. Dennis Hastert’s name from its public policy center after the former House speaker’s indictment on charges that he lied to the F.B.I. about financial transactions.

headline.main: Dennis Hastert’s Name Removed by Alma Mater
headline.print_headline: Hastert’s Name Removed by Alma Mater
